description: When creating a grazing platter for a crowd, pile it high. Opt for creamy cheeses, thinly sliced meats, fresh fruit, mixed nuts and a variety of crackers.
name: Ultimate deluxe platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 125 g Always Fresh crustini crispbread rosemary & sea salt
170 g King Island surprise bay cheddar or stokes point cheddar
100 g Olina's artisan crackers date & apricot
200 g King Island cape wickham double brie cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Finally, complete your board by filling any empty spaces with crackers. Put the crispbreads in a tall glass or jar and place it next to your board.
